headline: The School Burden Military Kids Face
abstract: Legislation to help the children of service members is stalled in committee.
lead_paragraph: By the time most military children complete secondary school, they will have switched schools up to nine times. These frequent changes between schools of strikingly varying quality trouble military children both socially and academically. Though Congress has written legislation that would ease transitions for military children and add flexibility to their parentsâ€™ choices for education, the bill, the Education Savings Accounts for Military Families Act of 2019, has sat in committee since March.
